name: da-kraken
description: A modern local application with engaging user experience - no external dependencies

scripts.validate: echo 'Validating HTML, CSS, and JS...' && npx html-validate index.html
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting JavaScript...' && npx eslint scripts/ || echo 'ESLint not installed'
scripts.format: echo 'Formatting code...' && npx prettier --write "**/*.{js,css,html,json,md}" || echo 'Prettier not installed'
scripts.build: echo 'No build process needed - this is a static app'
scripts.test: echo 'No automated tests yet - manual testing recommended'

author: Da-Kraken Team

devDependencies.comment: Development dependencies are optional - this app works without any build tools
